subject: Re: Dependencies between test-methods
msgSnippet: However in JavaDoc of Sortable class is clearly stated that Test sorting should not be used to cope with order dependencies between tests. So one can
messageBody:
However in JavaDoc of Sortable class is clearly stated that

"Test sorting should not be used to cope with order dependencies
between tests."

So one can conclude that:
a) it is technically possible to use sotring for manage dependencies
between tests;
b) it is not recommended to do so;

Again, it is work-around, not best practice. It's up to you to decide.
